verses.verse: By this I know that You are well pleased with me, Because my enemy does not triumph over me.
As for me, You uphold me in my integrity, And ((Job 36:7; Ps. 21:6; 34:15)) set me before Your face forever.
(Ps. 72:18, 19; 89:52; 106:48; 150:6) Blessed be the LORD God of Israel From everlasting to everlasting! Amen and Amen.

(BOOK TWO: 230 42-72) (Yearning for God in the Midst of Distresses) To the Chief Musician. A Contemplation of the sons of Korah. [1] As the deer pants for the water brooks, So pants my soul for You, O God.
(Ps. 63:1; 84:2; 143:6; (Jer. 10:10)) My soul thirsts for God, for the (Rom. 9:26; 1 Thess. 1:9) living God. When shall I come and appear before God?
